data.name: Путешествие паладина
data.detailed_description:
This is a story about a paladin that left his home monastery for the first time to go on quest. The quest appeared harder that paladin throught: she is haunted by demons now, and the only people who coul help her - ancient rivals of paladins, the Duids.
Dramatic story combining classic JRPG feateures with CRPG one:
  • Choose gender, appearence, background and skills on your hero.
  • Gather your party: six different characters who could join your quest.
  • Weave your fate: non-linear story with different outcomes.
  • Explore the world: find secret places and additional quests.

data.short_description: Non-linear dramatic story about a paladin that left his home monastery for the first time to go on quest. The quest appeared harder that paladin throught: she is haunted by demons now, and the only people who coul help her - ancient rivals of paladins, the Duids.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: Alcohol consumption, Mildly strong language (without profanity), Full nakedness (without erotic context), Torture, Murder, Discrimination, Sex scenes (description)
